flavor: Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Code. Sleep. Code. Code. Code. Eat. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code.
printed_text: [click], suffer 1 net damage: Gain 1[credit] and draw 2 cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: click, suffer 1 net damage: Gain 1 credit and draw 2 cards. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface → Any virus counter: Break sentry subroutine. Any virus counter: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. Interface -> Any virus counter: Break sentry subroutine. Any virus counter: +1 strength.

flavor: Getting it up the stairs was enough for him to know that if he ever moved, it was staying.
printed_text: The first time each turn you fully break the outermost piece of ice protecting the attacked server during a run, you may remove this hardware from the game to trash that ice.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you fully break the outermost piece of ice protecting the attacked server during a run, you may remove this hardware from the game to trash that ice.

flavor: Her gallop, thunder; her blade, lightning.
printed_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, the Corp loses 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, the Corp loses 1 credit.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5[credit], then you gain 1[credit] for each credit lost.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5 credits, then you gain 1 credit for each credit lost.

flavor:
"You called me, sir?"
"Why does my PAD keep flashing 'Sensitive Information Transfer'?!"
"Hmm, that's strange. Mine only does that on Tuesdays."
printed_text:
The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1[credit].
[click], 3[credit]: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.
stripped_printed_text: The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1 credit. click, 3 credits: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.

flavor: It was a deal, to be sure. She just didn't know for which party.
printed_text: [click], [trash], trash a card from your grip: Install a program, piece of hardware, or virtual resource from your heap, paying its install cost.
stripped_printed_text: click, trash, trash a card from your grip: Install a program, piece of hardware, or virtual resource from your heap, paying its install cost.

printed_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2[credit]. If you do, it gains code gate for the remainder of that encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2 credits. If you do, it gains code gate for the remainder of that encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +4 strength.

printed_text:
Flame-out can host a single program.
When you install Flame-out, place 9[credit] on it. Use these credits to pay for using hosted program.
When a turn ends in which you used credits on Flame-out, trash hosted program.
stripped_printed_text: Flame-out can host a single program. When you install Flame-out, place 9 credits on it. Use these credits to pay for using hosted program. When a turn ends in which you used credits on Flame-out, trash hosted program.

flavor: "The way I see it, I'm teaching them a lesson in the importance of basic security." - Sunny Lebeau
printed_text: The Corp must trace[4]. If unsuccessful, for the remainder of the turn, access 2 additional cards whenever you breach HQ or R&D.
stripped_printed_text: The Corp must trace[4]. If unsuccessful, for the remainder of the turn, access 2 additional cards whenever you breach HQ or R&D.

printed_text:
The first time each turn a successful run on a remote server ends, if you breached the server but stole no agendas, you may place 1 power counter on this resource.
When this resource has 4 or more hosted power counters, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn a successful run on a remote server ends, if you breached the server but stole no agendas, you may place 1 power counter on this resource. When this resource has 4 or more hosted power counters, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

printed_text: The rez cost of NEXT Diamond is lowered by 1 for each other rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
stripped_printed_text: The rez cost of NEXT Diamond is lowered by 1 for each other rezzed piece of NEXT ice. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn.
The Runner may suffer 1 brain damage. If they do not, they get -3 allotted [click] for their next turn.
Remove this operation from the game.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn. The Runner may suffer 1 brain damage. If they do not, they get -3 allotted click for their next turn. Remove this operation from the game.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ in the innermost position protecting that server, ignoring all costs. The Runner moves to that ice and approaches it. If this is not the first time they have approached a piece of ice this run, they may jack out. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may install 1 piece of ice from HQ in the innermost position protecting that server, ignoring all costs. The Runner moves to that ice and approaches it. If this is not the first time they have approached a piece of ice this run, they may jack out. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 2 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 4 cards of the stack.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 2 cards of the stack. Subroutine Do 2 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 3 cards of the stack. Subroutine Do 3 net damage unless the Runner trashes the top 4 cards of the stack.

flavor: "Deep down, everyone wants to be good. We ensure that desire is met." - Taavi Gyula
printed_text: The first time the Runner plays a run event or installs an icebreaker program each turn, you may give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: The first time the Runner plays a run event or installs an icebreaker program each turn, you may give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "Once we have enough data, we can make the Invisible Hand more like an Invisible Fist."
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses 3[credit] for each tag they have, then you gain 1[credit] for each credit lost this way.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner loses 3 credits for each tag they have, then you gain 1 credit for each credit lost this way.

flavor:
INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER NEUTRALIZED!
printed_text:
X is twice the number of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine]<trace>Trace X</trace> If successful, give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine]<trace>Trace X</trace> If successful, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: X is twice the number of ice protecting this server. Subroutine Trace X If successful, give the Runner 2 tags. Subroutine Trace X If successful, end the run.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 2 meat damage for each tag the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Do 2 meat damage for each tag the Runner has.

printed_text: False Flag can be advanced. When the Runner accesses False Flag, give the Runner 1 tag for every 2 advancement tokens on False Flag. [click], 7 hosted advancement tokens: add False Flag to your score area as an agenda worth 3 agenda points.
stripped_printed_text: False Flag can be advanced. When the Runner accesses False Flag, give the Runner 1 tag for every 2 advancement tokens on False Flag. click, 7 hosted advancement tokens: add False Flag to your score area as an agenda worth 3 agenda points.
